data.actual_result: Tooltip disappears and reappears when you move your cursor
data.expected_result: Tooltip doesn't disappear when moving your cursor
data.short_description: Hovering over reactions and moving to either the number or emoji causes tooltip to disappear and reappear
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a couple users react to a message - Hover over either the number or the emoji to get the tooltip - Move your cursor over the number or emoji, depending on which you hovered over first - Observe the tooltip
